measured_by: number of completed trials within the session
justification: “The number of completed trials … provided proxies for fatigue,” so accumulated trial count was used to quantify the animal’s fatigue level.

measured_by: amount of consumed reward within the session
justification: The authors write that “the amount of consumed reward since the beginning of the session provided proxies for … satiety,” making total reward intake their satiety measure.

measured_by: fixation breaks (center-port withdrawal before stimulus onset)
justification: Fixation breaks are described as “proactive responses occurring before stimulus onset,” indicating that the incidence of these breaks operationalises proactive responding.

measured_by: reaction times shorter than the stimulus-modulation onset (~95 ms)
justification: They “called express responses the responses occurring between stimulus onset and this modulation onset,” i.e., RTs below ~95 ms serve as the measure of the express-response construct.

measured_by: serial correlations embedded in the stimulus sequence
justification: “Stimulus sequences included serial correlations to study expectation-mediated choice biases,” meaning those programmed correlations were the tool for measuring the bias construct.
